attributes.action: Allow John Robert Lee of Middleton (near manchester) to take over this fine land!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a known fact that John Lee is a LEGEND! he is the profound manager of CONISTON (they rock) the best band in the land! and a keen supporter and if this petition works soon to be manager of Manchester United FC, sorry FERGIE! It was also be of great honour to announce our request to allow him to become CEO of BT one of the countries greatest companies! LONG LIVE THE LEGEND JOHN ROBERT LEE!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
